Label: plant phenological trait
Text definition: A {PATO:'quality'} of a {'portion of a plant'} or a {whole plant} that provides phenologically relevant information about the 'portion of a plant' or the 'whole plant'.

Label: plant structure presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of some {plant structure} that are part of a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: abscised plant structure presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of some {plant structure} that a {whole plant} has abscised or that have been removed from a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: new shoot system presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of new shoot systems {$new shoot system} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: new above-ground shoot-borne shoot system presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of new above-ground shoot-borne shoot systems {$new above-ground shoot-borne shoot system} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: new shoot system emerging from ground presence
Plant structure: new shoot system emerging from ground
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of new shoot systems emerging from ground {$new shoot system emerging from ground} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: new shoot system emerging from ground in first growth cycle presence
Plant structure: new shoot system emerging from ground in first growth cycle
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of new shoot systems emerging from ground in first growth cycle {$new shoot system emerging from ground in first growth cycle} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: seedling presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by whether or not a {whole plant} is a {seedling}.
Comments: For consistency with other trait measurements, 'seedling presence' is also measured with a count, which must be a binary value: 0 if the plant is a seedling, 1 if it is not.

Label: new shoot system emerging from ground in later growth cycle presence
Plant structure: new shoot system emerging from ground in later growth cycle
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of new shoot systems emerging from ground in later growth cycle {$new shoot system emerging from ground in later growth cycle} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: leaf bud presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of vegetative buds {$PO:'vegetative bud'} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: dormant leaf bud presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of dormant leaf buds {$dormant leaf bud} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: non-dormant leaf bud presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of non-dormant leaf buds {$non-dormant leaf bud} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: swelling leaf bud presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of swelling leaf buds {$swelling leaf bud} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: breaking leaf bud presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of breaking leaf buds {$breaking leaf bud} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of vascular leaves {$vascular leaf} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: true leaf presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of true leaves {$true leaf} on a {whole plant}.

Label: reproductive structure presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of reproductive structures {$reproductive structure} on a {whole plant}.

Label: floral structure presence

Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of non-senesced flowers {$non-senesced flower} on a {whole plant}.

Label: unopened flower presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of unopened flowers {$unopened flower} on a {whole plant}.

Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of open flowers {$open flower} on a {whole plant}.

Label: pollen-releasing flower presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of pollen-releasing flowers {$pollen-releasing flower} on a {whole plant}.

Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of senesced flowers {$senesced flower} on a {whole plant}.

Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of pollen-releasing flower heads {$pollen-releasing flower head} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: senesced flower head presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of senesced flower heads {$senesced flower head} on a {whole plant}.

Label: fruit presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of simple fruit or compound fruits {$simple fruit or compound fruit} on a {whole plant}.

Label: ripening fruit presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of ripening fruits {$ripening fruit} on a {whole plant}.

Label: unripe fruit presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of unripe fruits {$unripe fruit} on a {whole plant}.

Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of ripe fruits {$ripe fruit} on a {whole plant}.

Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of cones (strobili) {$strobilus} on a {whole plant}.

Label: pollen cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of pollen cones {$PO:'microsporangiate strobilus'} on a {whole plant}.

Label: fresh pollen cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of fresh pollen cones {$fresh pollen cone} on a {whole plant}.

Label: open pollen cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of open pollen cones {$open pollen cone} on a {whole plant}.

Label: seed cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of seed cones {$PO:'megasporangiate strobilus'} on a {whole plant}.

Label: fresh seed cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of fresh seed cones {$fresh seed cone} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: ripening seed cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of ripening seed cones {$ripening seed cone} on a {whole plant}.

Label: unripe seed cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of unripe seed cones {$unripe seed cone} on a {whole plant}.

Label: ripe seed cone presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of ripe seed cones {$ripe seed cone} on a {whole plant}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: abscised leaf presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of true leaves {$true leaf} that a {whole plant} has abscised.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: abscised fruit or seed presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of a whole plant's ripe fruits {$ripe fruit} that have been abscised or removed by an herbivore and/or the number of ripe fruits on a {whole plant} that have abscised at least one {mature seed}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more.

Label: abscised cone or seed presence
Text definition: A {plant phenological trait} that is measured by the number of a whole plant's ripe seed cones {$ripe seed cone} that have been abscised or removed by an herbivore and/or the number of ripe seed cones on a {whole plant} that have abscised at least one {mature seed}.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more and only includes the most recent cone crop.
